text: Gordon Richards (1904–1986) was an English jockey. Gordon Richards may also refer to: * Gordon Richards (astronomer) (born 1972), an American astronomer * Gordon Richards (footballer), (1933–1993), a Welsh footballer * Gordon W. Richards (1930–1998), a British racehorse trainer == See also == * Asteroid 166747 Gordonrichards, named after the astronomer
title: Gordon Richards (disambiguation)
